attributes.action: Move the annual Mayfair away from it current location in the City Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Along with a lot of people in Hereford I would like to see a new location found for the Mayfair in Hereford.

The reasons for this are that it simply causes far too much disruption to local businesses and shops and also brings in too much crime to the city centre. The noise that the fair brings every year is hell for the residential properties in the area as it goes on until late every night. The fair attract undesirable elements from all over the county and lots of crime and anti social behaviour.

It is about time it was moved to a new location such as Hereford race course where it would far less of a disruption.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
